SterlingLogParser.name: Sterling Log Parser
SterlingLogParser.ValidationExpression: (?x) #global setting: x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #Sterling time stamp :.* #Sterling log level :.* #Sterling log content
SterlingLogParser.ParsingExpression: (?sx) #global setting: s=dotall (use . to capture multi-line messages), x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input (?<time>\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3}) #Capture sterling time stamp as "time" :(?<level>\w+)\s* #Capture Sterling log level as "level" :(?<thread>\S+?)(_(?<service>\S+))?? #Capture String thread and optinally service as "thread" and "service" :(?<message>.*) #Capture Stering message as "message" \[\w+\]:\s* #Skip the Sterling's [system] block (?<actClass>\S+)\s* #Capture String action class as "actClass"

SterlingLogParser.name: JBoss Log Parser
SterlingLogParser.ValidationExpression: (?x) #global setting: x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #frist (JBOSS) time stamp \s\w* #JBOSS log level \s+\[STDOUT\] #JBOSS [STDOUT] text \s\(\S*\)\s #JBOSS method name (main) \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #Sterling time stamp :.* #Sterling log level :.* #Sterling log content
SterlingLogParser.ParsingExpression: (?sx) #global setting: s=dotall (use . to capture multi-line messages), x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #frist (JBOSS) time stamp \s\w* #JBOSS log level \s+\[STDOUT\] #JBOSS [STDOUT] text \s\(\S*\)\s #JBOSS method name (main) (?<time>\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3}) #Capture sterling time stamp :(?<level>\w+)\s* #Capture Sterling log level :(?<thread>\S+?)(_(?<service>\S+))?? #Capture Strling thread and optionally service name :(?<message>.*) #Capture Sterling message \[\w+\]:\s* #Skip the Sterling's [system] block (?<actClass>\S+)\s* #Capture String action class

SterlingLogParser.name: Perf JBoss Log Parser
SterlingLogParser.ValidationExpression: (?x) #global setting: x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #frist (JBOSS) time stamp :.* #Sterling log level :.* #Sterling log content
SterlingLogParser.ParsingExpression: (?sx) #global setting: s=dotall (use . to capture multi-line messages), x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input (?<time>\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3}) #Capture sterling time stamp :(?<level>\w+)\s* #Capture Sterling log level :(?<thread>\S+)(_(?<service>\S+))??\s* #Capture Strling thread and optionally service name :(?<message>.*) #Capture Sterling message \[\w+\]\s*:\s* #Skip the Sterling's [system] block (?<actClass>\S+)\s* #Capture String action class

SterlingLogParser.name: ECI App Server Log Parser
SterlingLogParser.ValidationExpression: (?x) #global setting: s=dotall (use . to capture multi-line messages), x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \[\d{1,2}/\d{1,2}/\d{1,2}\s\d{1,2}:\d{1,2}:\d{1,2}:\d{3}\s\w+\] #frist (JBOSS) time stamp \s\w+ #0000001fd \s\w+ #SystemOut \s+\w+\s+ # App Server thread number and SystemOut \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #Capture sterling time stamp :.* #Sterling log level :.* #Sterling log content
SterlingLogParser.ParsingExpression: (?sx) #global setting: s=dotall (use . to capture multi-line messages), x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \[\d{1,2}/\d{1,2}/\d{1,2}\s\d{1,2}:\d{1,2}:\d{1,2}:\d{3}\s\w+\] #frist (JBOSS) time stamp \s\w+ #0000001fd \s\w+ #SystemOut \s+\w+\s+ # App Server thread number and SystemOut (?<time>\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3}) #Capture sterling time stamp :(?<level>\w+)\s* #Capture Sterling log level :(?<service>\w+)\s* #Capture Strling service name :(?<thread>\s*\w+) #Capture Strling thread name :(?<message>.*) #Capture Sterling message \[\w+\]:\s* #Skip the Sterling's [system] block (?<actClass>\S+)\s* #Capture String action class

SterlingLogParser.name: Weblogic Log Parser
SterlingLogParser.ValidationExpression: (?x) #global setting: x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3} #Sterling time stamp :.* #Sterling log level :.* #Some weird Weblog stuff :.* #Thread :.* #Sterling log content
SterlingLogParser.ParsingExpression: (?sx) #global setting: s=dotall (use . to capture multi-line messages), x = Allow comments and ignore whitespace \A #Start of input (?<time>\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2},\d{3}) #Capture sterling time stamp as "time" :(?<level>\w+)\s* #Capture Sterling log level as "level" :\[\w+\]\s+\w+ #Skip [ACTIVE] ExecuteThread :(?<thread>.+?) #Capture String thread and optinally service as "thread" :(?<service>.+?) #Capture service :(?<message>.*) #Capture Stering message as "message" \[\w+\]:\s* #Skip the Sterling's [system] block \[\w+\]:\s* #Skip the Sterling's [CTC] block (?<actClass>\S+)\s* #Capture String action class as "actClass"
